org.gearvrf.accessibility

Interface GVRAccessibilitySpeechListener


  • public interface GVRAccessibilitySpeechListener
    Used for receiving notifications from the SpeechRecognizer when the recognition related events occur.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onBeginningOfSpeech()
      The user has started to speak.
      void onEndOfSpeech()
      Called after the user stops speaking.
      void onError(int code)
      A network or recognition error occurred.
      void onFinish()
      Finish speak recognition.
      void onRmsChanged(float rmsdB)
      The sound level in the audio stream has changed.

    • Method Detail

      • onBeginningOfSpeech

        void onBeginningOfSpeech()
        The user has started to speak.

      • onFinish

        void onFinish()
        Finish speak recognition.

      • onEndOfSpeech

        void onEndOfSpeech()
        Called after the user stops speaking.

      • onError

        void onError(int code)
        A network or recognition error occurred.
        Parameters:
        code - error int: code is defined in SpeechRecognizer.

      • onRmsChanged

        void onRmsChanged(float rmsdB)
        The sound level in the audio stream has changed. There is no guarantee that this method will be called.
        Parameters:
        rmsdB - float: the new RMS dB value.
